1 /**
  2  * Created by romans on 9/15/15.
  3  */
  4 
  5 /**
  6  * Facade function that implements Kaazing WebSocket communications via AMQP server
  7   * @param logInformation function that is used for logging events in a format of function(severity, message).
  8  * @returns {{AmqpClient object that implements communication functions}}
  9  * @constructor
 10  */
 11 var amqpClientFunction=function(logInformation){
 12     var queueName="client" + Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000);
 13     var routingKey="broadcastkey";
 14     function getRandomInt(min, max) {
 15         return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min;
 16     }
 17     var messageIdCounter = getRandomInt(1, 100000);
 18 
 19     var appId = (function () {
 20         var fmt = 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx';
 21         var ret=fmt.replace(/[xy]/g, function (c) {
 22             var r = Math.random() * 16 | 0, v = c === 'x' ? r : (r & 0x3 | 0x8);
 23             return v.toString(16);
 24         });
 25         return ret;
 26     })();
 27 
 28     var handleException = function (e) {
 29         logInformation("ERROR","Error! " + e);
 30         if (typeof (errorFunction)!="undefined" && errorFunction!=null)
 31             errorFunction(e);
 32     }
 33     /**
 34      * Provides communication services with AMQP server. Created within amqpClientFunction constructor.
 35      * @class
 36      * @name AmqpClient
 37      */
 38     var AmqpClient = {connected:false};
 39 
 40     var messageReceivedFunc=null;
 41 	var connectionEstablishedFunc=null;
 42     var errorFunction=null;
 43     var amqpClient=null;
 44     var publishChannel=null;
 45     var consumeChannel=null;
 46 
 47 
 48     var topicPub=null;
 49     var topicSub=null;
 50     var noLocalFlag=false;
 51     var user=null;
 52 
 53 	var publishChannelOpened=$.Deferred();
 54 	var consumeChannelOpened=$.Deferred();
 55 
 56 
 57     var publishChannelOpenHandler=function(){
 58         logInformation("INFO","OPENED: Publish Channel");
 59 
 60         publishChannel.declareExchange({exchange: topicPub, type: "fanout"});
 61 
 62         // Listen for these requests to return
 63         publishChannel.addEventListener("declareexchange", function() {
 64             logInformation("INFO","EXCHANGE DECLARED: " + topicPub);
 65             publishChannelOpened.resolve();
 66         });
 67 
 68         publishChannel.addEventListener("error", function(e) {
 69             handleException("CHANNEL ERROR: Publish Channel - " + e.message);
 70         });
 71 
 72         publishChannel.addEventListener("close", function() {
 73             logInformation("INFO","CHANNEL CLOSED: Publish Channel");
 74         });
 75 
 76     }
 77 
 78     var consumeChannelOpenHandler=function(){
 79         logInformation("INFO","OPENED: Consume Channel");
 80 
 81         consumeChannel.addEventListener("declarequeue", function() {
 82             logInformation("INFO","QUEUE DECLARED: " + queueName);
 83         });
 84 
 85         consumeChannel.addEventListener("bindqueue", function() {
 86             logInformation("INFO","QUEUE BOUND: " + topicSub+ " - " + queueName);
 87         });
 88 
 89         consumeChannel.addEventListener("consume", function() {
 90             logInformation("INFO","CONSUME FROM QUEUE: " + queueName);
 91             consumeChannelOpened.resolve();
 92         });
 93 
 94         consumeChannel.addEventListener("flow", function(e) {
 95             logInformation("INFO","FLOW: " + (e.args.active ? "ON" : "OFF"));
 96         });
 97 
 98         consumeChannel.addEventListener("close", function() {
 99             logInformation("INFO","CHANNEL CLOSED: Consume Channel");
100         });
101 
102         consumeChannel.addEventListener("message", function(message) {
103             var body = null;
104 
105             // Check how the payload was packaged since older browsers like IE7 don't
106             // support ArrayBuffer. In those cases, a Kaazing ByteBuffer was used instead.
107             if (typeof(ArrayBuffer) === "undefined") {
108                 body = message.getBodyAsByteBuffer().getString(Charset.UTF8);
109             }
110             else {
111                 body = arrayBufferToString(message.getBodyAsArrayBuffer())
112             }
113             logInformation("DEBUG","Received from the wire "+body);
114             try{
115                 body= JSON.parse(body);
116             }
117             catch(e){
118                 logInformation("WARN", "Received object is not JSON");
119             }
120             messageReceivedFunc(body);
121         });
122 
123         // The default value for noAck is true. Passing a false value for 'noAck' in
124         // the AmqpChannel.consumeBasic() function means there should be be explicit
125         // acknowledgement when the message is received. If set to true, then no
126         // explicit acknowledgement is required when the message is received.
127         consumeChannel.declareQueue({queue: queueName})
128             .bindQueue({queue: queueName, exchange: topicSub, routingKey: routingKey })
129             .consumeBasic({queue: queueName, consumerTag: appId, noAck: true, noLocal:noLocalFlag });
130     }
131 
132     var openHandler=function(){
133         logInformation("INFO","CONNECTED!!!");
134 
135         logInformation("INFO","OPEN: Publish Channel");
136         publishChannel = amqpClient.openChannel(publishChannelOpenHandler);
137 
138         logInformation("INFO", "OPEN: Consume Channel");
139         consumeChannel = amqpClient.openChannel(consumeChannelOpenHandler);
140 		$.when(publishChannelOpened, consumeChannelOpened).done(function(){
141 			AmqpClient.connected=true;
142 			if (typeof(connectionEstablishedFunc) != "undefined" && connectionEstablishedFunc!=null){
143 				connectionEstablishedFunc();
144 			}
145 		});
146     }
147     // Convert a string to an ArrayBuffer.
148     //
149     var stringToArrayBuffer = function(str) {
150         var buf = new ArrayBuffer(str.length);
151         var bufView = new Uint8Array(buf);
152         for (var i=0, strLen=str.length; i<strLen; i++) {
153             bufView[i] = str.charCodeAt(i);
154         }
155         return buf;
156     }
157 
158     // Convert an ArrayBuffer to a string.
159     //
160     var arrayBufferToString = function(buf) {
161         return String.fromCharCode.apply(null, new Uint8Array(buf));
162     }
163 
164     // Create a WebSocketFactory which can be used for multiple AMQP clients if
165     // required. This lets you defined the attributes of a WebSocket connection
166     // just once – such as a ChallengeHandler – and reuse it.
167     //
168     var createWebSocketFactory = function() {
169 
170         webSocketFactory = new $gatewayModule.WebSocketFactory();
171         return webSocketFactory;
172     }
173     /**
174      * Connects to Kaazing WebSocket AMQP Gateway
175      * @param url Connection URL
176      * @param username User name to be used to establish connection
177      * @param password User password to be used to establish connection
178      * @param topicP Name of the publishing endpoint - AMQP exchange used for publishing.
179      * @param topicS Name of the subscription endpoint - AMQP exchange used for subscription
180      * @param noLocal Flag indicating whether the client wants to receive its own messages (true) or not (false). That flag should be used when publishing and subscription endpoints are the same.
181      * @param messageDestinationFuncHandle Function that will be used to process received messages from subscription endpoint in a format: function(messageBody)
182      * @param errorFuncHandle function that is used for error handling in a format of function(error)
183      * @param connectFunctionHandle function this is called when connection is established in a format: function()
184      */
185     AmqpClient.connect=function(url,username, password, topicP, topicS, noLocal, messageDestinationFuncHandle, errorFunctionHandle, connectFunctionHandle){
186         topicPub=topicP;
187         topicSub=topicS;
188         user=username;
189         messageReceivedFunc=messageDestinationFuncHandle;
190 		connectionEstablishedFunc=connectFunctionHandle;
191         errorFunction=errorFunctionHandle;
192         noLocalFlag=noLocal;
193         var amqpClientFactory = new AmqpClientFactory();
194         var webSocketFactory;
195         if ($gatewayModule && typeof($gatewayModule.WebSocketFactory) === "function") {
196             webSocketFactory = createWebSocketFactory();
197             amqpClientFactory.setWebSocketFactory(webSocketFactory);
198         }
199         else{
200             handleException("Cannot create WebSocket factory - module is not loaded!");
201         }
202         amqpClient = amqpClientFactory.createAmqpClient();
203         amqpClient.addEventListener("close", function() {
204             logInformation("INFO","Connection closed.");
205         });
206 
207         amqpClient.addEventListener("error", function(e) {
208             handleException(e);
209         });
210         var credentials = {username: username, password: password};
211         var options = {
212             url: url,
213             virtualHost: "/",
214             credentials: credentials
215         };
216 		try{
217 			amqpClient.connect(options, openHandler);
218 		}
219         catch(e){
220 			handleException(e);
221 		}
222     }
223 
224     /**
225      * Sends messages to a publishing endpoint.
226      * @param msg Message to be sent. As messages are sent in a text format msg will be converted to JSON if it is not a string.
227      */
228     AmqpClient.sendMessage=function(msg){
229         if (typeof msg ==="object"){
230             msg=JSON.stringify(msg);
231         }
232         var body = null;
233         if (typeof(ArrayBuffer) === "undefined") {
234             body = new ByteBuffer();
235             body.putString(msg, Charset.UTF8);
236             body.flip();
237         }
238         else {
239             body = stringToArrayBuffer(msg);
240         }
241         var props = new AmqpProperties();
242         props.setContentType("text/plain");
243         props.setContentEncoding("UTF-8");
244         props.setDeliveryMode("1");
245         props.setMessageId((messageIdCounter++).toString());
246         props.setPriority("6");
247         props.setTimestamp(new Date());
248         props.setUserId(user);
249 
250         publishChannel.publishBasic({body: body, properties: props, exchange: topicPub, routingKey: routingKey});
251     }
252 
253     /**
254      * Disconnects from Kaazing WebSocket AMQP Gateway
255      */
256     AmqpClient.disconnect=function(){
257         amqpClient.disconnect();
258     }
259 
260     return AmqpClient;
261 };
262
